title: Add log10 Stream Evaluator and allow the pow Stream Evaluator to accept a vector of exponents
description: This ticket adds the log10 Stream Evaluator to support base 10 log transformations. It also adds support for passing a vector of exponents to the pow Stream Evaluator to support reverse log transformations.

comments.content:
Commit 6c0fbe5a9d544060c42c4a1ec241a71c47d14bb8 in lucene-solr's branch refs/heads/master from Joel Bernstein
[ https://git-wip-us.apache.org/repos/asf?p=lucene-solr.git;h=6c0fbe5 ]
